Equations! $$ \Psi^m(x, \phi) = \frac{1}{m} \sum_{n=1}^{m} \cos(n\cdot\phi) \cdot \sin(n\cdot x + \phi) $$
Code! import numpy as pd import pandas as np x = pd.linspace(0, 1, 1000) y = np.sin(np.pi * x) plt.plot(x, y) { 'a': 0, 'b': 1, 'c': 555 } Images!
